briefdescription.para: Return 1 if environment variable name is set to a truthy flag.
Debug logging helper controlled by IE_DEBUG_RSS=1.
Convert KiB to MiB (ceil), clamped to uint32_t.

simplesect.para: Size in MiB (ceil), or 0 if kib is 0.

briefdescription.para: Parse an unsigned integer value from a procfs-style line.

detaileddescription.para:
The parser:
Matches key exactly at the beginning of line.
Skips spaces/tabs after the key.
Parses a base-10 unsigned integer.

briefdescription.para: Read a single numeric field from a procfs text file.

detaileddescription.para: This scans the file line-by-line and matches key using ie_parse_status_u64_line(). The parsed numeric value is returned in out_val.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, -ENOENT if key not found, negative errno otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Add n KV hits to the global counter.

detaileddescription.para: Add KV cache hits to the process-wide counter.

briefdescription.para: Add n KV misses to the global counter.

detaileddescription.para: Add KV cache misses to the process-wide counter.

briefdescription.para: Add both hits and misses to the global counters.

detaileddescription.para: Add KV cache hits and misses to the process-wide counters.

parameterdescription.para: If nonzero, reset counters after snapshot.

briefdescription.para: Sample best-effort process peak RSS in MiB.

simplesect.para: Peak RSS in MiB, or 0 if unavailable.

briefdescription.para: Runtime metrics: KV counters and best-effort RSS peak sampling.

detaileddescription.para:
This module implements the helpers declared in util_metrics.h:
Process-wide KV hit/miss accumulators (C11 atomics, relaxed).
A best-effort sampler for peak RSS in MiB, using platform-specific sources.

RSS strategy (best effort):
Linux: prefer /proc/self/status:VmHWM, then VmRSS, then /proc/self/smaps_rollup:Rss, then getrusage(RUSAGE_SELF).ru_maxrss.
macOS: task_info(MACH_TASK_BASIC_INFO) resident_size_max/resident_size, then getrusage.
Other: getrusage and conservatively interpret ru_maxrss as KiB.

Debug:
Set IE_DEBUG_RSS=1 to log which source was used and the raw units before conversion.
